conbody.p: A blade is a third-party software CPM uses for processing data. For example, Saxon, GraphViz, FOP are treated as blades by CPM.
CPM can be delivered and deployed together with blades. Alternatively, a user can obtain a blade himself/herself and deploy it outside of a CPM folder.
A blade must be registered in a CPM configuration file. Otherwise a blade is unavailable for CPM.
